title: Fantasy Battle Music & Loops
description: Introducing Fantasy Battle Music & Loops, an epic arsenal of musical firepower designed to elevate your gaming experience to legendary heights.
longDescription:
Audio demo


Dive into a realm where 51 meticulously crafted tracks and loops await, each pulsating with the raw energy of battle and a few for lighter ones for towns. 


Contained within this mighty collection are 38 dynamic music loops and 13 non-loopable soundtracks, all presented in pristine 44.1k 16bit .wav format. With a total file size of 524 MB, immerse yourself in over 24 minutes of mix of heart-pounding music, ready to lighter cinematic scores to unleash upon your audience.


Whether you're orchestrating a clash of titans or guiding heroes through perilous quests, these royalty-free compositions are your key to creating unforgettable moments in your game. From thunderous battle anthems to haunting melodies that echo through ancient ruins, every track is meticulously crafted to enhance the atmosphere of your virtual world.


Designed to be YouTube friendly and RTU-OTB (ready to use out of the box), Fantasy Battle Music & Loops also includes Soundminer metadata for effortless navigation and integration into your project. So, sharpen your swords, prepare your spells, and embark on a musical journey that will leave players breathless. Are you ready to conquer the battlefield of sound?


Includes over 24 minutes of soundtracks, cues & soundscapes that are perfect for RPG, RTS, fantasy, adventure, battle, puzzle, casual & mobile games, and fulfills scenarios like loading screens, menu pages, gameplay, levels, scene breaks, splash screens, game logos and game start & over screens. 


Product Details

Youtube friendly

RTU-OTB (ready to use out of the box)

Includes Soundminer metadata for easy search capability
